name: Raúl Álvarez González
title: UX and product design
bio: Más de 8 años de experiencia como diseñador de UI y de UX, 5 de los cuales han estado centrados en aplicaciones móviles nativas. Actualmente UX Lead en ClusterSeven

name: Gema López Pérez
title: Creatividad y dirección de arte
bio: Diseñadora gráfica/ Directora de arte con más de 13 años de experiencia trabajando en importantes estudios de diseño en Madrid para clientes como Repsol, Enagás, Daikin, Grupo Mahou - San Miguel, Adif, Sepes - Ministerio de Vivienda, etc. Actualmente soy socia/ directora de La Merienda - diseño para campeones y profesora de Diseño Gráfico en la Facultad de Bellas Artes en la Universidad de Salamanca.

name: Karina Ibarra
title: Design/UX expert at Google Developers
bio: Karina is the founder and CEO at myABCKit, a startup developing a play-based language learning platform for kids.As well, she leads Arquinauta, a studio that designs digital products for kids.She's been working in digital design for almost 18 years, specializing in concept development, interaction design, information architecture, usability and user research. Over the years, Karina has designed products and services for desktop and mobile – and for big institutions and educational companies.On her spare time she woks as Design/UX expert at Google Developers and as Sprint Master at Google Venture. Karina is especially interested in changing the way children learn at school, and is currently developing a new educational product, myABCKit, in order to bring play-based learning experiences into schools.

name: Silvia Calvet
title: Design/UX expert at Google Developers
bio:
Since 1999 I'm working at the intersection of Business, Technology and People. I have developed expertise across Innovation, Business Strategy, Digital Product and Service Design; as well as in Team Leadership, Project Management, Business processes and Organisational Culture. I’m passionate about customer experience, collaboration, business results and sustainable grow. I work with organizations and teams to understand problems, identify needs and constraints to create valuable products and services that meet business goals and customers needs.
I’m passionate about customer experience, collaboration, business results and sustainable grow. I work with organizations and teams to understand problems, identify needs and constraints to create valuable products and services that meet business goals and customers needs.

name: Daniel Armengol Altayó
title: Interaction between people, technology, art and design

name: Antonio Juan Sánchez
title: Senior Developer
bio: Antonio Juan Sánchez Martín is an engineer in Computer Sciences at the University of Salamanca and owns a Bachelor Degree in Design at the Valencian High Institute of Art. He has worked as developer/analyst at BeOnPrice and front-end developer at ElParking and as a researcher at the University of Salamanca. He is specially interested in Art & Tech.

name: Andrés Leonardo Martínez Ortíz
title: Developer Program Manager
bio: Computer Engineer working on Developer Program. ACM, IEEE & Computer Society member. The opinions stated here are my own, not necessarily those of my company

name: Antonio de Dios
title: Art Director
bio: Salmantino, de los De Dios de toda la vida. Defensor del usuario, director de arte digital, artesano y perseguidor de ideas. Fan acérrimo de herraizsoto. Ha trabajado con grandes personas de pequeñas marcas y con marcas que salen en la tele.
